contentList.content: Autosorting containers for your arrows, scrolls, grenades, letters, books, weapon coatings and potions.

"A single quiver is never sufficient for the discerning adventurer and their myriad projectile types. This leather shoulder belt is ideally suited for holding arrows, among other things." - Ribald Barterman.

"Let no apprentice wizard tell you a codex is the safest place to store your spells. This sturdy container allows dozens of scrolls to be placed in it, safe from exposure and elements alike." - Ribald Barterman.

"Don't need to read the stars to know wrapping up each potion bottle is tiresome work. This leather case folds open, and allows the user to strap delicate potion bottles to its cushioned sides with numerous leather thongs for safe storage during travel." - Ribald Barterman.

"The most savvy artificers keep their fingers by keeping their powder away from ignition sources. This sturdy case keeps your volatile throwables safe and accessible during travel." - Ribald Barterman.
"At the Adventurer Mart, we always counterspell aspersions. This discreet case is muffled to keep your weapon coatings safe and quiet, and looks at home on any adventurer's hip." - Ribald Barterman.
